recipe.title: Grilled Salmon with Nectarine Salsa
ingredients: 2 teaspoons whole coriander seeds, coarsely cracked, divided
instructions: Mix first 7 ingredients in medium bowl. Season salsa to taste with salt and pepper. Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Brush salmon with oil. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander; press to adhere. Grill salmon until slightly charred and just cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to plates. Top with salsa and sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon coriander.
